customer_name: B J'S & Guys L L C
site_name: B J's & Guys L L C
narrative:
This focused inspection was a follow-up to the routine inspection conducted on 27 Jan. 2016.  The issue with the
right eye of the male Chinese pug (#14) identified during that inspection has been addressed.
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative, Dr. Margaret Shaver, VMO and Kendall Lundy, ACI.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
